name: Fruit Quench'rz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil Trio
about: What it is:This limited-edition lip-oil trio goes on clear and cushions lips with fruit oils and extracts..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Loss of Firmness, and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba Seed and Rosehip Fruit Oils: Lock in moisture and soothe dry lips..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This break-apart lip-oil trio nourishes dry, chapped lips and visibly plumps with hydration while decadent oils bind moisture to lips. These lip oils feature three juicy scents: Barbados Cherry, Kalahari Melon, and Passion Fruit to wear or share as the ultimate holiday treat..This Set Contains:- 0.19 oz/ 5.6 mL Barbados Cherry Lip Oil.Clinical Results:In a 4-week clinical study of 49 people, instantly:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Jojoba Seed and Rosehip Fruit Oils: Lock in moisture and soothe dry lips..-Sweet Cherry Seed Oil: Infuses lips with essential fatty acids to moisturize and nourish.  .-Barbados Cherry (Acerola) and Wild Cherry Extracts: Antioxidant-rich; condition and renew lips...Barbados Cherry Lip Oil: .Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dextrin Palmitate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Extract*, Prunus Serotina (Wild Cherry) Fruit Extract*, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Root Extract, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aroma/Flavor...Kalahari Melon Lip Oil: .Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dextrin Palmitate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Extract*, Prunus Serotina (Wild Cherry) Fruit Extract*, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Root Extract, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aroma/Flavor...Passion Fruit Lip Oil: .Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dextrin Palmitate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Extract*, Prunus Serotina (Wild Cherry) Fruit Extract*, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Root Extract, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aroma/Flavor...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply as often as needed for instantly hydrated, smooth lips...Recycling Instructions:.-Its protective outer box is made of FSC material and is recyclable. .-FSC certification ensures that our boxes come from responsibly managed forests..-When you‚Äôre done, swipe on the last of the goodness. .-Then, rinse and discard the cap and recycle the bottle.

reviews.review_text: Keeps my lips hydrated and has a gloss look without it being sticky. the trio is definitely worth it as you get different flavors for a good price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip oils and all 3 scents smell amazing! The doe foot is large which I love because I have full lips. The formula feels nice and hydrating with no sticky or gooey feeling. It lasts a decent amount of time without needing to reapply. I've used many different lip oils on the market and these are just about on par with the others. However, compared the the others, these are quite expensive, even when on sale.

The applicator itself is soft on the lips. The formula definitely works how it says it both hydrates and repairs however it is a little sticky in the end. I think it‚Äôs definitely worth buying, especially

reviews.review_text: disappointed with this product. When it arrived, two of the bottles were almost empty. Additionally, the scent was very artificial and not pleasant at all. Even on sale, it‚Äôs not worth the price. Overall, there‚Äôs nothing great about these‚Äîdefinitely wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing wrong with these, but there are just so many options for lip oil out there and these do not stand out in any way. They smell nice and feel hydrating when applied. The applicator is the oversized, soft kind that I really like.   Other than that, I‚Äôve used lip oils that were more hydrating and that have lasted longer. These don‚Äôt have any tint either. Not really noticeable at all, other than having a fun, fruity smell.   I‚Äôm ok with the price I paid for these, since they were on sale and I applied a further discount with the code available for fenty that far. But I wouldn‚Äôt purchase them again.
doesnt wear off fast and makes my lips feel so hydrated even in the cold

reviews.review_text: This oil just isn‚Äôt living up to the hype. I would apply it and it wouldn‚Äôt stay glossy. Which caused me to keep applying the product. It also caused my lips to be come dryer and then my skin started to peel off on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it - but it‚Äôs not worth it for me. It has an artificial strong smell (but it goes away after a few minutes). It feels thick and hydrating while it‚Äôs on but left my lips dry after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down THE BEST lip product out there! If you‚Äôre debating on getting this or summer Fridays etc. GET THIS!! The pack is on sale and so worth it, 1 lip oil is $24. They smell like candy and feel very nice on the lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I see these multipacks I stock up ! I get for myself and my mom. And we both love them. Very hydrating so your lips look glossy and plump but not sticky. Just right for the winter weather!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt normally do these reviews, but when I saw this set on Black Friday for like $25 I was like‚Ä¶ I NEED TO GET IT NEOW! And I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. In terms of flavor from greatest to least would be: Cherry, Passion Fruit and then the Melon. The trio is not necessary but I do love interchanging which one I use one a day to day

reviews.review_title: You can break up these boxes into 3 gifts!

reviews.review_text: Love the fruity scents of these.Texture is nice & thick but not sticky. This set can be split up & gifted to different people so it‚Äôs a great value. Not a long lasting oil but still good. Packaging not luxe but oil itself is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These oils are so good and moisturizing. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lip oils all smell great and are very hydrating and long lasting. They don‚Äôt really have any color on the lips but I like that for application before bed. The only real downside is that hair will stick to your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scents all smell really good and fruity! It lasts longer than most lip oils I‚Äôve used and has a thicker consistency. Makes my lips feel hydrated for a long time. I just wish it wasn‚Äôt so expensive, but you get what you pay for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Barbados cherry and the shine is amazing. I don‚Äôt really notice the scent n I‚Äôm ok with that.  I‚Äôm obsessed with the quality and shine alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Rih you snapped gurl!! These are amazing! They smell so delicious and feel amazing on the lips! A must! A must! A must!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg the smells on this lipgloss are sooo good. It‚Äôs not sticky at all. I love this lip oil. I had to buy 2 of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has a lovely hugging texture, not sticky, great taste/scent but at the en of the day, I had dry flaky lips. I tried it a little bit later for another whole day and the same thing happened. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this pack because I LOVE passionfruit and it didn't disappoint! I love the colour, consistency, and how my lips feel afterwards. I wish they sold the passionfruit on its own, because im not a fan ot the cherry.  I also wouldn't say that this formula is strengthening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my God the consistency with these oils are so good literally my fave product from fenty they glide on so well and smell so bomb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been eyeing this lip oil for a while so I was really happy when fenty came out with this holiday pack. They all smell like candy/lollipops and are very moisturising. No colour but that's okay. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is just okay. I really don't like the packaging, looks very cheap in person. Doesn't smell like I expected. Doesn't taste bad. A little bit disappointed this time... But I still really like this brand.

reviews.review_title: A five-star lip oil from Fenty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a single tube and got hooked so I had to order this trio. The scents are delicious, they're not super sticky, and they feel great on the lips. I like to wear this overnight as well as a lip mask over my regular balm. My favorite is the Barbados cherry but they're all very good and they don't leave a nasty taste in your mouth like other lip oils I've tried. I highly recommend these.

reviews.review_title: Lip quenchers - just what your parched lips need.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are spot on for me. I am going to make sure that from now on I always have one of these on hand. Not sticky, and my lips feel so moisturized. I didn't think I would like passion fruit but it ended up being my favorite one.
